column4: Rythmbox seems uh... not as featured as some others.  What I'd really like is for Audacious to have better gnome integration.  Nice old-skool winamp interface.  I'm not a fan of the new iTunes look.
i'd try the up-to-date one on their site (http://www.sacredchao.net/quodlibet); the one in the dapper repos is a bit old
